Title: Bank Rejected
Message: The request for linking your Bank account has been rejected.

Title: Bank Approved
Message: Your request for linking Bank account has been approved.

Title: Ckyc Rejected
Message:
Your KYC Request has been rejected due to mismatch in the details, please fill in
the requirements again in order to continue further journey.

Title: Ckyc Approved
Message: Your KYC Request has been approved, please continue with the further journey.

Title: Pledge accepted
Message: Congratulations! Your loan application has been accepted. Please e-sign the loan agreement to avail the loan now.

Title: Pledge rejected
Message: Sorry! Your loan application was turned down since the {pledge} was not successful due to technical reasons

Title: Pledge partially accepted
Message: Congratulations! Your {pledge} request was successfully considered and was partially accepted. Please e-sign the loan agreement to avail the loan now.

Title: E-signing was successful
Message: Your E-sign process is completed. You shall soon receive a confirmation of your loan approval.

Title: Loan approved
Message: Congratulations! Your loan account is open. You may now withdraw funds as per your convenience.

Title: Loan rejected
Message: Sorry! Your loan application was turned down due to technical reasons.

Title: Unpledge application accepted
Message: Congratulations! Your {unpledge} request has been successfully executed.

Title: Unpledge application rejected
Message: Sorry! Your {unpledge} application was turned down due to technical reasons.

Title: Sell request executed
Message: Congratulations! Your {sell} collateral request has been successfully executed and {sale} proceeds credited to your loan account.

Title: Sell request rejected
Message: Sorry! Your {sell} collateral request was turned down due to technical reasons.

Title: Application for top-up accepted
Message: Congratulations! Your Top Up application has been accepted. Please e-sign the loan agreement to avail the loan now.

Title: E-signing was successful
Message: Your E-sign process is completed. You shall soon receive a confirmation of your new OD limit.

Title: Loan account topped up
Message: Congratulations! Your loan account has been topped up.

Title: Top up rejected
Message: Sorry! Your top up request could not be executed due to technical reasons.

ID: Margin shortfall – Action required after hours
Title: Margin shortfall – Action required
Message: URGENT ACTION REQUIRED. There is a margin shortfall in your loan account {loan}. Please take an appropriate action within {shortfall_action} hours; else {sale} will be triggered.

ID: Margin shortfall – Action required at eod
Title: Margin shortfall – Action required
Message: URGENT ACTION REQUIRED. There is a margin shortfall in your loan account {loan} which exceeds {max_threshold}% of portfolio value. Please take an appropriate action by {eod_time} Today; else {sale} will be triggered.

Title: Sale triggerred
Message: URGENT NOTICE.{Sale} has been triggered in your loan account as margin shortfall exceeds {max_threshold}% of portfolio value.

Title: Sale triggerred
Message: URGENT NOTICE. A {sale} has been triggered in your loan account {loan} due to inaction on your part to mitigate margin shortfall.

Title: Sale triggerred completed
Message: Sale of securities initiated by the lending partner for your loan account {loan} is now completed.

Title: Margin shortfall – Action taken
Message: Thank you for taking action against the margin shortfall.

Title: Increase loan application accepted
Message: Congratulations! Your Increase loan application has been accepted. Please e-sign the loan agreement to avail the loan now.

Title: Increase loan application rejected
Message: Sorry! Your Increase loan application was turned down since the pledge was not successful due to technical reasons.

Title: Increase loan application partially accepted
Message: Congratulations! Your pledge request was successfully considered and was partially accepted for Rs. {total_collateral_value_str} due to technical reasons.Please e-sign the loan agreement to avail the loan now.

Title: Increase loan application approved
Message: Congratulations! Your loan limit has been successfully increased. You may now withdraw funds as per your convenience.

Title: Increase loan application turned down
Message: Sorry! Your Increase loan application was turned down due to technical reasons.

Title: Withdrawal successful
Message: Your withdrawal request has been executed and Rs. {amount} transferred to your designated bank account.

Title: Partial withdrawal successful
Message: Your withdrawal request for Rs. {requested} has been partially executed and Rs. {disbursed} transferred to your designated bank account.

Title: Withdrawal rejected
Message: Sorry! Your withdrawal request has been rejected by our lending partner for technical reasons.

Title: Payment credited to account
Message: You loan account {loan} has been credited by payment of Rs. {amount} . Your loan balance is Rs. {loan_balance}. {datetime}

Title: Payment failed
Message: Sorry! Your payment of Rs. {amount} was unsuccessful against loan account {loan}. Please check with your bank for details.

Title: Interest due
Message:
An interest of Rs. {unpaid_interest} is due on your loan account {loan}.
Please pay the interest due before the 7th of this month in order to continue to enjoy the rebate provided on the interest rate.

Title: Rebate reversed
Message:
Rebate of Rs. {unpaid_interest} was reversed in your loan account {loan}. This will appear as 'Addl Interest' in your loan account. 
Please pay the interest due before the 15th of this month in order to avoid the penal interest/charges.

Title: Penal interest charged
Message:
Penal interest of Rs.{unpaid_interest} has been debited to your loan account {loan} .
Please pay the total interest due immediately in order to avoid further penal interest charges.

Title: Margin shortfall timer resumed
Message:
Dear Customer,
The margin shortfall timer has been resumed on your loan account {loan}

Title: Margin shortfall timer paused
Message:
Dear Customer,
Due to bank holiday the margin shortfall timer on your loan account {loan} has been paused on {stop_time} and will resume on {start_time}.

Title: Lien unsuccessful
Message: Sorry! Your loan application was turned down since the requested loan amount is not in the range of lender's minimum sanction limit (Rs.{minimum_sanctioned_limit}) and maximum sanction limit (Rs.{maximum_sanctioned_limit}) criteria
